text: The women's 1500 metres event at the 1991 Summer Universiade was held at the Don Valley Stadium in Sheffield on 24 and 25 July 1991. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Sonia O'Sullivan '''' |Iulia Besliu '''' |Qu Yunxia '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== Heats results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;font-size:95%" |- !
